subtask:
(1) Register the water bottle and the suitcase (which will be used as a bag).
(2) Move the robot to the water bottle.
(3) Grasp the water bottle.
(4) Move the robot to the suitcase.
(5) Open the suitcase.
(6) Put the water bottle into the suitcase.
(7) Close the suitcase.
code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Grasp the water bottle
    water_bottle = registry(env, "water_bottle_284")
    EasyGrasp(robot, water_bottle)
    donothing(env)
